name: Lamina1
description: Lamina1 is a creator-owned platform and new economy designed for the future of IP incubation, distribution, and monetization. Founded in June 2022 by legendary author/futurist Neal Stephenson, crypto pioneer Peter Vessenes, and immersive entertainment executive Rebecca Barkin, LAMINA1 provides the tools and infrastructure for builders and creators to make, share, and monetize multi-media content â€“ enabling fan participation in the storyworlds they love.
